transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir, good morning. Hello. Hello, sir, [inaudible].
Customer: Sir, aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Executive: Haan, aa rahi hai, aa rahi hai, aa rahi hai. Hello.
Executive: Sir, mein Tanu baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se, kaise ho aap?
Customer: Haan, bolo ji, bolo.
Executive: Sir, kal aapko kitni baar call kiya, aapne uthaya hi nahi.
Customer: Aapne jis time pe call kiya, jis time mein busy tha.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan, kiya tha. Are, woh actually mein call maine kiya tha aap logo ke liye nahi yaar, mera ek friend hai Hyderabad se.
Executive: Haan, haan.
Customer: Toh unka profile hai, unki profile pe woh bilkul bhi koi kaam nahi kar raha hai. Nahi, woh banda unka phone bhi itna attend karta hai, bol raha hai call karo, yeh karo. Toh actually mein kya tha, meri baat toh suno. Toh unhone mujhe number diya hai toh maine woh call lagaya toh call 9696 pe hi lag gaya.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Toh waise woh tha. Haan. Call toh maine matlab woh dusre uski profile bhi mere paas nahi hai. Woh toh bechara pareshan hoke usne bol diya mere ko samajh hi nahi aa raha hai. Toh usne mere ko de diya tha woh profile. Toh mein usme kuch theek kiya aur kuch mere ko woh karna tha usme. Matlab puchna tha, kuch changing karwane the. Toh call woh banda utha hi nahi raha tha. Ek number pe maine call lagaya jo uski profile pe number dikh rahe the na.
Executive: Kitne number pe aapne call kiya? Number mein number.
Executive: Haan, mein batati hu. Aap mujhe inka profile ka naam batao, company name kya hai?
Customer: Ek minute, ek.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Toh uspe kaam nahi kar raha, woh pareshan nahi hoga. Usne bechare ne ₹70,000 bhi woh dale hai.
Executive: Hmm, hmm.
Customer: Ek minute hai na. Shiva. Naam, mera bande ka naam hai Shiva Prasad.
Executive: Nahi, nahi, company name batao sir aap.
Customer: Company ka naam usne kya dala hai?
Customer: Trishan Traders aisa kuch naam hai. Mein spelling bolta hu, likho zara.
Executive: Haan, batao.
Customer: T R double E.
Executive: T R double E.
Customer: S H A N.
Executive: S H A N.
Customer: D H, woh wala hai na, D H A N.
Executive: D H A N.
Executive: D H.
Executive: Mein na ek minute line pe rehna. Aap mobile number bata do inka.
Customer: Mera nahi hai na, uska hai na.
Executive: Aapko mobile number yaad hai inka? Pata hai?
Customer: Achha, unka? Haan, unka mobile number hai. Haan, yaar, screenshot maine liya toh hai lekin yeh nahi blur aa dikh nahi raha hai. Mobile number unka na woh meri wife ka hai woh. List mein unki wife ka number hai. Unka nahi hai. Koi nahi, koi nahi. Unka number toh mere paas hai hi hai.
Executive: Aap ek kaam karo. Ek minute, aapne message dala mere ko?
Executive: Haan, screenshot bhejo aap mujhe.
Customer: Screenshot yeh raha, usme yeh naam hai uska. Maine dal diya aapko WhatsApp mein.
Executive: Ek second.
Customer: Yeh Hyderabad ka hai, mera dost hi hai. Matlab mera kaafi purana dost hai. Toh inka profile hai, kaam koi nahi kar raha hai. Aap agar le sakte ho toh mein woh request daal ke aapko dila deta hu.
Executive: Aap yeh company se matlab inke Hyderabad se hai?
Customer: Haan, Hyderabad se.
Executive: Yeh company kuch trade service mein dikh nahi rahi hai. Service chal rahi hai inki?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Six month hue hai, unko unhone paise diye hue hai inko. Toh inka koi aa hi nahi raha hai na. Woh bol raha hai ₹70,000 maine dale the. Lekin inka profile mere laptop mein open bhi hai. Maine kuch change kiya hai, kuch change karna hai isme. Lekin koi vichar ko response nahi de rahe hai.
Executive: Kyunki is naam se sir company aa nahi rahi hai.
Customer: Ek minute ruko aur isme. Yeh aapne website batai hai kya inki?
Customer: Dekho aa gayi, aa gayi, aa gayi. Yeh hai kya inka? Hyderabad se company hai na, Tree and Hands karke.
Executive: Haan, haan, haan.
Executive: Theek hai. Yeh inki services chal rahi hai. Mein is time inki service chal rahi hai, theek hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Chal rahi hai, sab kuch hai, paise lagwae bechare ne ₹70,000 koi response nahi hai. Aur mera achha dost hai. Mera Bangalore mein bhi ek friend hai uske jaise yeh hai. Iske saath bhi mera kaam karne ka planning hai ek do month mein.
Executive: Achha, achha.
Customer: Toh iska yeh koi response nahi, koi kuch bhi nahi aa raha bol raha hai yaar kya karu. Toh maine phone kiya toh woh bande phone nahi utha rahe the. Jo profile account manager hai na, dono ko phone kiya tha. Phone nahi utha rahe the. Fir maine 96 pe kiya toh woh aapke paas aa gaya. Mere number pe IndiaMART pe hai na, problem woh ho gaya.
Executive: Hmm, hmm.
Executive: Koi nahi. Actually mein isme mein aapko number de deti hu jo bhi handle kar rahe hai, do logo ke paas hai isme. Toh aap unke number pe. Woh logo ke paas bhi phone nahi utha rahe hai. Ek toh kuch Reddy kya nahi kuch aisa karke hai, maine dekha tha.
Executive: Hmm, hmm.
Customer: Toh bhai, iska koi change karwana ho. Isme bahut profile mein changing karna hai yaar, bahut matlab woh kabada karke rakha hai, kuch hai bhi nahi bechare ka.
Executive: Haan, catalog bhi theek nahi hai sir. Aur yeh ek aur hai aur ek Gorwala Linga Reddy karke hai isme jinke paas.
Customer: Haan, are dono farzi aadmi hai, koi matlab nahi hai.
Customer: Phone bhi nahi utha raha. Nahi usko woh bol raha koi response de rahe the. Unke khilaaf woh complaint bhi dalna hai mujhe aur profile bhi account manager change karna hai mujhe.
Executive: Toh sir, inke number se aap call karna. Jo yeh.
Customer: Are unke number phone hi toh nahi utha rahe the. Fir ek bande ne phone uthaya, sir mein dusre ke inke saath meeting mein hu mein baad mein call karta hu. Phone hi nahi uthaya uske baad mein.
Executive: Achha, achha. Toh fir ek kaam karo. Toh kya kar sakte hai fir?
Executive: Yeh Tree Hands wale jo hai na, isme inki profile pe jo number add hai jaise last mein 40 470 hai aur ek hai 238 wala. Is number se agar woh call karenge toh unki profile pe hi customer care se call jayega fir. Aap apne number se karenge toh aapki profile pe lag raha hai call.
Customer: Wahi toh problem hai.
Customer: Toh lekin woh profile toh mere paas mein na. Uska usne toh delete maar diya apne phone se bol raha mere ko toh nahi samajh mein aa raha hai yeh log farzi hai, fraud hai. Toh maine bola mere ko de mein kar raha hu toh mein isliye dekh raha hu mein kar raha hu toh maine bola kaise ho sakta hai yeh cheez.
Executive: Achha, toh iske liye fir mujhe thoda sa time do mein ek baar puch leti hu ki isme matlab is profile pe connect karne ke liye kaise kya kare toh mein aapko detail de deti hu. Aap isse call kar lena. Mein bata deti hu ek minute ruko.
Customer: Haan. Number bata dijiye mere ko uska.
Executive: Inka matlab official number bhi bata deti hu aur normal number bhi bata deti hu.
Executive: Permit karke hai, inka number note kar lo aap.
Executive: Yeh 6387.
Customer: Ek minute rukna zara.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Kya bol rahe ho?
Executive: 6387.
Customer: 6387.
Customer: Are ruko, ruko, ruko. Maine kaha calculator dikha de number dalne shuru kar diye. Neend mein hu mein bhi abhi tak.
Customer: 6387.
Executive: 6387207800. Mein inka number WhatsApp kar deti hu.
Customer: 2078 double.
Executive: Mein aapko WhatsApp kar deti hu.
Customer: Aap bolo toh sahi abhi.
Executive: 6387207800.
Customer: Double zero, theek hai. Woh isliye bol raha hu last mein double zero tha na woh nahi sunai diya.
Executive: Dekho maine inka dono number bhej diye. Jo Pratham Srivastava hai, ek yeh number pe aap call kar lena. Kyunki maybe ho sakta hai.
Customer: Mein WhatsApp kar raha hu aapko.
Executive: Haan, haan, ek baar aap baat kar lo.
Customer: Agar isme woh number change karwana ho toh kaise ho sakta hai?
Executive: Aapko yeh jo primary number change karana hai?
Customer: Haan, primary aise kuch karna hai mein mera number karu toh.
Executive: Sir, dekho aapka yeh jo number aapka already pada hai woh toh isse wali Madhusha wali pe pada hai. Ispe agar aap dalna chahte ho toh yeh jo primary number hai ispe OTP jayega tab aap change kar paoge.
Customer: Hmm. Iske OTP leke aapko change karna padega sir.
Executive: OTP deke kaise change.
Executive: Haan. Settings pe jana, settings pe PNS call settings pe jaake change kar sakte ho aap.
Customer: Theek hai. Okay, mein inse baat karta hu fir.
Executive: Achha sir, mein aapka profile ka toh concern aapki profile ka toh concern ban kar du yaha par ki aapko apni profile se related koi problem nahi hai?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Ji sir? Nahi, nahi, nahi, nahi, apne aise kuch nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai. Toh mein yeh close kar deti hu aur aapke paas mera personal number toh hai hi. Agar kuch bhi agar nahi connect ho pata ya kuch other issue aata hai toh aap mujhe personally call kar lena. Woh toh phone already kiya tha unke liye call kiya tha woh toh maine.
Executive: Nahi, nahi, koi nahi. Mein yeh band kar deti hu aur agar koi bhi kuch bhi lagta hai na kuch aapko matlab problem aati hai toh aap mujhe call kar lena, theek hai sir?
Customer: Chalega, chalega.
Executive: Okay, theek hai, theek hai. Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's friend's IndiaMART profile not working.

- Friend unable to get a response.

- Wants to change account manager.



Resolution:

- Executive provided contact numbers for assistance.

- Explained process to change primary number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will contact IndiaMART support.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- profile, support, contact, change, number, account
